attributes.action: Fund gender neutral public toilets in public spaces
attributes.additional_details: As a transgender person, binary or non-binary, going to public restrooms can be a struggle. As a non-binary person myself I find it very socially awkward. Going to your birth-assigned gender’s toilet when no longer identifying as such is very hard for the LGBT community and feels very downgrading. I also hope in introducing gender neutral toilets it could normalise the trans community as at times we can feel very rejected by society. I hope this petition could change the public view on our minority.
attributes.background: I want the Government to provide funding for local authorities to introduce gender neutral toilets into public spaces including schools, colleges, shopping centres and parks.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
